  children={"Get a site by orgId and niceId. NiceId is a readable ID for the site and unique on a per org basis."}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/org/{orgId}/site/{niceId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get a site by orgId and niceId. NiceId is a readable ID for the site and unique on a per org basis.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

</ParamsDetails>
